law.catch_line: Persons selling less than 150 gallons of honey in a year.
law.text: If a person sells less than one hundred fifty (150) gallons of honey in a year off the farm, the person shall not be required to process the honey in a certified honey house or food processing establishment, nor shall the person be required to obtain a permit from the cabinet. The person shall be required to comply with the other provisions of KRS 217.005 to 217.215 as those provisions apply.
law.history: Created 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 134, sec. 1, effective July 15, 2002.
